com.sun.enterprise.security.jmac

Interface WebServicesDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebServicesDelegateImpl

    @Contract
public interface WebServicesDelegate
    A Delegate Interface for handling WebServices Specific Security and JSR 196 Providers This insulates the GF Web-Bundle from any WebServices Dependencies.
    Author:
    kumar.jayanti
